lead_paragraph: Set upon by a group of boys while growing up on the hard, scrabble streets of Kampala, 14-year-old Ronald Serugo had a thought beaten into him - some boxing skills might be good.

headline.print_headline: Boxing-Childhood Beating Leads Serugo to Rio Games
headline.main: Boxing-Childhood Beating Leads Serugo to Rio Games
